text: Tapa'i bhanidinush ki he manisaharu! Yadi timila'i mero dharmama kunai prakarako sanka cha bhane (sunirakha ki) allaha baheka jasako timile puja gardachau, ma tyasako puja gardina, baru ma usa allahako puja gardachu jasale timro prana nikalnecha, ra mala'i yo adesa bha'eko cha ki imana bha'ekamadhye rahum
